title: An Introduction to the defence cataloguing system
creator_credit: Yoram Gross Films, Film Australia, Frank Bagnall and Yoram Gross
brief_description: Modern warfare involving greater man power and more complex weaponry creates greater problems of supply. Efficient supply management is essential. A common supply language has been devised enabling items to be easily found.
